alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Peoria; Tazewell (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 3:59PM CDT until April 20 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Fulton County in west central Illinois... West central Tazewell County in central Illinois... Southwestern Peoria County in central Illinois... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 358 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cuba, or near Lewistown, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... St. David around 405 PM CDT. Canton around 410 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Glasford, Trivoli and Hanna City. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and west central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
